T02D3105:192b-0: @192b [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] @193a * //
T02D3105:192b-1: po gru gsum gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D3105:192b-2: de nas de nyid dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D3105:192b-3: tshur byon tshur gshegs 'byung ba che //
T02D3105:192b-4: lha yi rgyal po drang srong mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du //
T02D3105:192b-5: 'bar ba'i nang du gshegs su gsol //
T02D3105:192b-6: ae hye aagna ye ma h'a r'a dza ga dza:/
T02D3105:192b-7: h'um 'byung ba chen po me yi lha //
T02D3105:192b-8: lha rgyal drang srong bde ba'i mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang //
T02D3105:192b-9: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3105:192b-10: de nas yon chab kyis spyan drangs la /
T02D3105:192b-11: bsang gtor byin te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3105:192b-12: de nas mchod pa dang phyag gis mchod de /
T02D3105:192b-13: mar gyi dgang blugs phul te /
T02D3105:192b-14: tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyur pa'i //
T02D3105:192b-15: gzi brjid chen po me yi lha //
T02D3105:192b-16: sku bcas sku ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D3105:192b-17: rngam brjid rgyan ldan las sa dbang //
T02D3105:192b-18: sreg blugs phul bas las rnams sgrub //
T02D3105:192b-19: zhi la sogs pa'i lha dpal te //
T02D3105:192b-20: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las sgrub pa //
T02D3105:192b-21: gzi brjid rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3105:192b-23: aagna ye ha bya ka bya ba ha na ya /
T02D3105:192b-25: sarba p'a pam sh'antim ku ru zhes pa'am /
T02D3105:192b-26: aom badzra aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:192b-30: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:192b-31: til dang yungs kar phyag tu'o //
T02D3105:192b-32: sarba sam pa de zho dang 'bras chan phyag tu'o //
T02D3105:192b-33: aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya /
T02D3105:192b-45: ma h'a shra ya aa ma po ti /
T02D3105:192b-50: rdzas thams cad me lha'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o //
T02D3105:192b-51: au du mw'a ra la sogs ming dang thog ma tha mar brgyan te bsreg par bya'o //
T02D3105:192b-55: mar me dang mchod yon rnams ni so sor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3105:192b-56: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva
T02D3105:192b-57: la ya sarba bhasmim ku ru sarba dusht'am ma ma
T02D3105:192b-58: h'um phat sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:193b-0: me lha gzi brjid skyed pa'i @193b dgang blugs phul ba /
T02D3105:193b-1: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02D3105:193b-2: de nas me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor pa'am lha
T02D3105:193b-3: rnams dkar po la sogs par bskyed pa las 'od
T02D3105:193b-4: zer 'phros pa las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan
T02D3105:193b-5: drangs la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung dang /
T02D3105:193b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa dang /
T02D3105:193b-13: rgyal ba'i rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D3105:193b-14: gtum chen stobs chen 'bar ba mo //
T02D3105:193b-15: bgegs tshogs 'joms ma gshegs su gsol ;
T02D3105:193b-16: / bsang gtor phul te mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par bya'o //
T02D3105:193b-17: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa 'byung ba'i rim pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3105:193b-18: de nas gong ma bzhin du dgang blugs dang sreg blugs dbul lo //
T02D3105:193b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa tre h'um /
T02D3105:193b-20: aa mu kam sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:193b-21: aom h'um ma ma h'um ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:193b-22: zhes snying po'am nye ba'i snying po'am /
T02D3105:193b-23: aom na mo bha ga wa te aushn'i sh'a ya shuddhe bi ra tsi bi ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:193b-25: rdzas so so'i sngags rnams kyi khyad par gyis dkyil 'khor pa'am /
T02D3105:193b-26: lha rnams tshim par bya ste /
T02D3105:193b-27: sdig pa sreg pa'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o //
T02D3105:193b-28: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la smon lam gdab bo //
T02D3105:193b-29: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar mo can phyag
T02D3105:193b-30: rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa ji ltar tshogs pa'i mchod
T02D3105:193b-31: pa dang / sbyin sreg rnams kyis mchod pas /
T02D3105:193b-32: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang /
T02D3105:193b-33: sems can thams cad sgrib pa gnyis phyang nas /
T02D3105:193b-35: tshe 'di nyid du bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D3105:193b-36: chen po thob par gyur cig ces gsol ba btab
T02D3105:193b-37: la / gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la /
T02D3105:193b-38: phrin las su gsol ba ni /
T02D3105:193b-39: bdag dang yon gyi bdag po rnams la nad kyi
T02D3105:193b-40: rigs su gyur pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad
T02D3105:193b-41: kan dang 'dus pa las gyur pa thams cad zhi
T02D3105:193b-42: bar mdzod cig / gdon gyi rigs su gyur pa
T02D3105:193b-43: gdon stong phrag brgyad cu las thar bar mdzod cig
T02D3105:193b-44: /'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'i nad thams cad zhi
T02D3105:194a-3: bdag snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi sems can du gyur pas yo byad ma tshogs pa dang /
T02D3105:194a-4: bdag las dang po par gyur pas sems la dbang ma thob ste /
T02D3105:194a-5: bying ba dang rgod pa'i dbang gis mi gsal ba dang /
T02D3105:194a-6: cho ga nyams te lhag chad du gyur pa thams cad bzod pa chen po mdzad du gsol lo //
T02D3105:194a-7: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs te /
T02D3105:194a-8: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D3105:194a-9: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D3105:194a-10: gtan du gshegs pa ma lags pas //
T02D3105:194a-11: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol ;
T02D3105:194a-12: / mu: gatstsha zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3105:194a-13: mjug tu me lha mchod pa dang /
T02D3105:194a-14: las bsgrub pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D3105:194a-16: 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras //
T02D3105:194a-17: me lha'i rgyal bo drang srong mchog gyur pa //
T02D3105:194a-18: ye shes mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg /'dzin byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3105:194a-19: gzi brjid ldan pa me yi lha //
T02D3105:194a-20: 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad pa //
T02D3105:194a-21: bdag gzhan don sgrub sa la bzhugs //
T02D3105:194a-23: de nas ye shes kyi me lha gshegs te /
T02D3105:194a-24: bskyed pa me 'bar ba la bltas te /
T02D3105:194a-25: aom ma ma h'um ni sarba da ha na badzr'a ya tsha ge mo sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D3105:194a-26: zhes bya bas brgya'am stong ngam khri'am 'bum mam /
T02D3105:194a-27: ji srid nus pas bsreg par bya'o //
T02D3105:194a-28: bdag gi cho ga'i rim pa 'dis //
T02D3105:194a-29: lhag pa'i lha rnams mnyes bya ste //
T02D3105:194a-30: srid pa'i brtson rar nyam thag pa'i //
T02D3105:194a-31: 'gro kun srid mtsho brgal bar shog /'phags pa de
T02D3105:194a-32: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung
T02D3105:194a-33: ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg
